### Developer's checklist
- [ ] I self-reviewed the code
- [ ] I wrote unit tests for inputs and outputs

- [ ] I checked accessibility according to [Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 2.1](https://www.w3.org/TR/WCAG21/)
